Interface SpatialRepresentation

All Known Subinterfaces:
Georectified, Georeferenceable, Grid­Spatial­Representation, Vector­Spatial­Representation
All Known Implementing Classes:
Abstract­Spatial­Representation, Default­Georectified, Default­Georeferenceable, Default­Grid­Spatial­Representation, Default­Vector­Spatial­Representation
@UML(identifier="MD_SpatialRepresentation", specification=ISO_19115) public interface SpatialRepresentation
Digital mechanism used to represent spatial information.
Since:
2.0
